description: 2 apartment buildings with 6 units each for a total of 12 units, following net zero carbon ready requirements.
duration_in_months: My grouping for this task was to show the information in this JSON format. I wrote all of the category groups that were mentioned in this in a JSON format with the corresponding value.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Title:** Request for Expression of Interest (RFEOI) - Net Zero Carbon Apartment Buildings

**Reference Number:** MX-42926879194
**Publication Date:** November 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 21, 2023, 16:00:00
**Amendment Date:** November 21, 2023

Government Requirements
--------------------

Defence Construction Canada invites general contractors to express their interest in a bid for two net-zero carbon apartment buildings at CFB Edmonton, Alberta. The RFEOI is the first step of a two-step procurement process. Tenderers must respond to this RFEOI to be eligible to submit a bid during the tender phase.

The project involves construction of two 3-storey apartment buildings with two-bedroom units each. The buildings are to be net-zero carbon ready, with a total building area of 460 m². Associated parking lot work will be required as part of the contract.

**Tender Description:**

Defence Construction Canada invites general contractors to express their interest in a contract for the construction of two net-zero carbon apartment buildings at CFB Edmonton, Alberta. This will be a negotiated contract, and the building area will be approximately 460 m².

The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA). The estimated total value of the contract is approximately $19.2 million.

The anticipated award date is targeted for November 28, 2023. The completion date is expected to be within 550 calendar days of the award notification and completed within 30 calendar days after substantial completion.

**Required Documents:**

* Defence Construction Canada's Standard Construction Contract Documents for Electronic Bidding, DCL 250E
* Technical plans and specifications will be provided during the tender phase

**Security Requirements:**

This project does not require industrial security requirements.

**Language:**

All contract documents and communications will be in English and French, as per the preference of the contractor.

**Submissions:**

Submissions must be made electronically through the Merx website.

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or clarification requests, please contact [Brett Cooper](mailto:brett.cooper@dcc-cdc.gc.ca) at Defence Construction Canada.

**Attachments:**

None

**Fee:**

Fees may apply for accessing the documents through the Merx website.

We look
